  1. [15/09/2025 - 18:48] noreply: CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.Please ensure your personnel complete their required training as soon as possible. Meta LearningYou have personnel who need to complete Meta's required trainingHi Contingent Workforce Suppliers, As of 09/15/2025, you have personnel who have not yet completed Meta’s required training courses. Please review the attached report and follow up with the individuals identified to ensure they complete this training as soon as possible. Thank you, The Meta Learning teamFrequently asked questionsWhat happens if active Contingent Workers (CWs) do not complete the training by the due date?A list of CWs who do not complete required training before the due date will be escalated to Meta leadership. CWs with access to Meta systems will be locked out until training is completed. Further non-compliance will result in CWs being fully offboarded from Meta systems if training is not completed. Re-onboarding can take up to 2 weeks. What action should a CW who no longer supports Meta take?The supplier or CWM should take these steps: Internal users go to Contingent Services Center (CSC).Select “Contingent Workers.”Update search filters if necessary.Next to the CW name, click the three-dot menu (...).Follow the prompts to Extend, Update Details or Offboard.Alternatively, internal users can submit a CWX Intake Form to request offboarding. Users without internal access can email cwx@meta.com.Are you the incorrect contact for this notification?To update supplier contacts, go to Supplier Connect > Profile > Contacts. Contact support@sourcetopay.facebook.com for support.What if a CW is on leave or requires an accommodation?The CW supplier should contact cwx@meta.com with their leave or accommodation requirements. CWs with leaves of absence for more than 30 calendar days will be referred to CWX to deactivate until they return.Questions?Contact LegalTraining@cases.meta.com with questions about training.Contact the CWX Team with questions about CW assignments. Internal users can Ask the CWX Team. External users can email CWX at cwx@meta.com. This message was sent to billing@gep.com. © 2025 Meta. Meta Platforms, Inc., 1 Meta Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025 or where the Meta Products are offered to you by Meta Platforms Ireland Limited, Merrion Road, Dublin 4, D04 X2K5, Ireland.Disclaimer: This message contains information that may be privileged or confidential and is the property of GEP, its subsidiaries, its affiliates and its clients. It is intended only for the person to whom it is addressed. If you are not the intended recipient, you are not authorized to read, print, retain copy, disseminate, distribute or use this message or any part thereof. If you receive this message in error, please notify the sender immediately and delete all copies of this message.
